Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 75th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2010...
Injured on 8/2/2013 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/31/2013 with a Broken Foot, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/29/2014 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2016 (Going to PIT: LF A. Shipman, P S. Diamond. Going to CLE: C A. Hedges, P B. Kim)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/2017, off Michael Pineda (CHN)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (N) on 9/7/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/7/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
